sect1.title: Product Documentation
sect1.para: This guide covers installing &sle; on &rpi;. For information on using &sle; on &rpi;, such as system and network administration, storage, hardening and security, containers, and other tasks, and for support options, refer to the following sections.

sect2.para: A valid and activated subscription entitles you to receive bug and security fixes, feature updates, and technical assistance from &suse;'s support organization. Learn more at . Via the &scc; at you can open an incident.

In addition, &suse; has provided conversation forums where you can get answers to questions. Go to . Under the main forum category SUSE Linux Enterprise Server select the sub-forum SLES for Raspberry Pi.
